review_blob: Wow! This will kick your butt if your not paying attention! Big pop of hops, aroma and taste. Very good. Light IPA hearted, be aware.
beer_name: Oskar Blues Deviant Dales India Pale Ale

review_blob: Wow, took me by surprise! The nose is incredibly hoppy! Wouldnt expect an aroma like this from the color that it is. As far as an IPA drinker, this is incredibly balanced.
As far as aroma and nose, not much there... Has a hazy color to it. Buy the taste took me off guard. Nice citrus balance!

I love this pale ale. It drinks like a normal pale ale, but has a lot of bright hot taste and character. Not much as far as aroma, but the palette makes up for it. Very easy drinker. For those not too sure about IPAs yet, this will be a great stepping stone!
Very good IPA. Nice pine flavor from hops. Very crisp in palate. Nice copper color. A smooth drinker at 6.2 ABV
A little on the sweet side, from the maple.  Not my cup of tea, (or beer).  Only 4.5%, but drinks a little stronger than that.
